text:
@realDonaldTrump @Twitter @realDonaldTrump trying to figure out today’s meltdown cause:

Governor Cuomo ringing the opening bell for the stock market 

Or

Everyone learning you rolled back regulations in 2017 that would have required hospitals/care facilities be prepared for crisis like COVID-19
